name: WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope.crossOriginIsolated
description: The crossOriginIsolated read-only property of the WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope interface returns a boolean value that indicates whether a SharedArrayBuffer can be sent via a Window.postMessage() call.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'crossOriginIsolated' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
